lines.text: Ahh yes, this should do nicely.
Looks like there used to be a door here in the game files.
The developer probably axed it due to time contstraints.
It means that there is a warp point here that I can adjust!
Wow, is this how we can get to a new game?
Yeah, just got to fiddle with this, and set that, and move that a bit and...
Come through whenever you are ready, I know it's scary.
Okay, just give me a moment to prepare myself...
I'll be right there on the other side. See you soon!
